Text.val: 27.06.2014 JH SCR18975 Added tests on DCRM_ORIGIN
16.04.2014 GB SCR18827 Changed where clause for get the 1.12 Comment i.e. DCRM_NOTICE
06.03.2014 GB SCR18692 Added button Comments and multi-line selected, removed test message when Release Finance is use, added
27.01.2014 GB SCR18599 Extended condition for allow deletion
17.09.2013 SH SCR18337 Changed sequence of button
02.09.2013 SH SCR18393 Added auto. change button delete label Delete/Verification

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1 where ARCH_SCHT_NO = :2 AND ARCH_HYPA_DEPARTMENTNAME = 'HASA' AND ARCH_DOCTYPE = 277 AND ARCH_DATEDELETED IS NULL

Text.val: -- Refresh task "Message Text", only if MQTX data exists
-- Used virtual (initialized with real column value) to prevent multiple calc of new numbers
if the current selected MQDT row is not released (row change), no screen refresh is performed

ExpSyntax.val: ({0,45}='' OR {0,45}=Upper (User (0))) AND InStr ({1,8},'M')<>0 AND (MMCurr (0)=MMCount (0) OR MMCount (0)=1)
InStr ({1,8},'M')<>0 AND NOT (Stat (0,'C'MODE)) AND (MMCurr (0)=MMCount (0) OR MMCount (0)<2)

Text.val: -- Refetch INVO, INVO_MARKCODESPEC probably already changed via GB101 when button
... Deletion is also processed if only BSP018 was performed
-- At least a text must be entered or a code must be selecetd or BSP018 had to be performed
.. Continue to delete if text is entered and/or CODX was selected

ExpSyntax.val: IF(NOT(ISNULL({0,7})) AND Trim ({0,7})<>'',Trim({0,7})&ASCIIChr(13)& ASCIIChr(10),'')&IF({8,13}=0,MlsTrans('Added to credman chain AF'), IF({8,13}>0,MlsTrans('Added to credman chain BF'),''))
